sentences.en: a train accident
sentences.cn: 火车事故

sentences.en: After the accident he had no feeling in his legs.
sentences.cn: 事故过后，他的腿丧失了知觉。

sentences.en: Captain Cook safely navigated his ship without accident for 100 voyages.
sentences.cn: 库克船长驾驶的船安全出航100次无事故。

sentences.en: For failing to report the accident, his licence was endorsed.
sentences.cn: 由于发生事故未能报告，他的驾驶执照被注明违章。

sentences.en: he was able to stop the train without accident.
sentences.cn: 他能安全地停住火车。

sentences.en: His middle son died in a drowning accident five years back.
sentences.cn: 他排行居中的那个儿子5年前意外溺水身亡。

sentences.en: I had a slight accident with your coffee.
sentences.cn: 出了个小小的意外，我把你的咖啡弄洒了。

sentences.en: I met her quite by accident (=  completely by accident  ) .
sentences.cn: 我遇见她完全是偶然。

sentences.en: I’m sorry about breaking the vase – it was an accident (=  I did not intend to do it  ) .
sentences.cn: 对不起，我把花瓶打碎了——这是个意外。

sentences.en: It's not clear whether the incident was an accident or deliberate.
sentences.cn: 还不清楚这起事件是意外还是蓄意所为。

sentences.en: Ken had an accident at work and had to go to hospital.
sentences.cn: 肯在工作中出了事故，不得不去医院。

sentences.en: Over 70,000 people are seriously injured every year in road accidents.
sentences.cn: 每年在道路事故中受重伤的有七万多人。

sentences.en: problems like these should not occur, but accidents will happen.
sentences.cn: 这类问题不应出现，但保不定会有意外的。

sentences.en: Richardson severed his right foot in a motorbike accident.
sentences.cn: 理查森在一次摩托车事故中失去了他的右脚。

sentences.en: She thought the shooting might have been an accident.
sentences.cn: 她想这次枪击可能是一次意外。

sentences.en: She was injured in a freak accident (=  an unusual accident  ) when a wall suddenly collapsed.
sentences.cn: 她在一场墙壁突然倒塌的诡异事故中受了伤。

sentences.en: Steve had told her that he'dbeen in an accident on Wednesday night.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫已经告诉过她自己周三晚上出了事故。

sentences.en: The accident again raises questions about the safety of the plant.
sentences.cn: 这起事故再一次引发了人们对于工厂安全性的质疑。

sentences.en: The accident happened at the junction of Forest Road and Pine Walk.
sentences.cn: 事故发生在森林路与松树路的交叉口。

sentences.en: The accident is already shaping up as a significant environmental disaster.
sentences.cn: 这次事故已经造成严重的环境灾难。

sentences.en: The accident was caused by people slowing down to rubber-neck.
sentences.cn: 事故是由为了看热闹而减速的人引起的。

sentences.en: The discovery was a happy accident.
sentences.cn: 这个发现是机缘巧合的。

sentences.en: The discovery was made almost by accident.
sentences.cn: 这项发现几乎纯属意外。

sentences.en: The mine reportedly had an accident rate triple the national average.
sentences.cn: 据报道，该矿事故发生率是全国平均水平的3倍。

sentences.en: The pilot, whether by accident or design (=  whether it was planned or not planned  ) , made the plane do a sharp turn.
sentences.cn: 不知是有意还是无意，那名飞行员让飞机来了个急转弯。

sentences.en: The police say his death was an accident, officially at least.
sentences.cn: 警方说他的死是个意外，起码官方消息如此。

sentences.en: They lost their lives in a tragic accident .
sentences.cn: 他们在一次悲惨的事故中丧生。

sentences.en: Through some unfortunate accident, the information reached me a day late.
sentences.cn: 由于发生了不幸的意外，我知道消息的时候已经晚了一天。

sentences.en: Weir broke his leg in a freak accident playing golf.
sentences.cn: 韦尔因为一次打高尔夫时发生的离奇事故折断了腿。
